constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 36 (Thursday, February 25, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. STEWART:
H.R. 1383.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1, Clause 2 & Clause 3
[Page H732]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules, and in addition to the Committee on the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Debt Control Through Budget Reconciliation Act of 2021
